'''''Paimon's Lucky Day!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to draw a "Great Fortune" fortune slip at the [[Grand Narukami Shrine (Subarea)|Grand Narukami Shrine]].
